dct_title_s: Map of the environs of Jerusalem
dct_description_sm: H.H. Hardesty publisher and proprietor ; Shober & Carqueville, lith. co.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Bar scale on map given in "Miles".
Shows topography, roads and travel routes, places of historical interest.
